_header: Now shrinketh rose and lily flower
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of
_description: An autumn song in praise of the Virgin Mary — six 10-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Nou skrnkeþ rose & lylie flourþat whilen ber þat
                    suete sauour…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Iesu haue merci of vsþat al þis world
                    honoure
